root.data: BEGIN; CREATE TABLE cache_entries (hash CHARACTER(32) PRIMARY KEY, content_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, last_modified DATETIME NOT NULL, last_accessed DATETIME NOT NULL, content BLOB NOT NULL); CREATE INDEX last_accessed_index ON cache_entries (last_accessed); COMMIT;>

data.name: GetCacheEntryByHash
data.value: SELECT hash, content_type, last_modified, content FROM cache_entries WHERE hash = $hash;

data.name: InsertCacheEntry
data.value: INSERT INTO cache_entries (hash, content_type, last_modified, last_accessed, content) VALUES ($hash, $content_type, $last_modified, $last_accessed, $content);

data.name: UpdateCacheEntryLastAccessDate
data.value: UPDATE cache_entries SET last_accessed = $last_accessed WHERE hash = $hash;

data.name: DeleteLeastAccessedCacheEntries
data.value: DELETE FROM cache_entries WHERE hash IN (SELECT hash FROM cache_entries ORDER BY last_accessed LIMIT $amount);
